name: Super Jump Guy
description:
Super Jump Guy is the hottest new platformer of 19XX! With cutting-edge 8-bit graphics and challenging gameplay, you'll want to play it again... and again... and again...

"Wait a second... haven't I been here before...?"

Originally created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47.

Controls:

  • Arrows: Move
  • Z: Select/Jump
  • X: Back
